pullrequest.title: Convert opende libraries to be static and not installed (->default)

content.raw:
I was imaging that all that gazebo wants to expose to users is hosted in gazebo_physics_ode interface (library and headers) and if anybody needs to access to other ODE core features, he/she can use the main ode library and headers instead of the gazebo fork. It sounds a bit tricky to me to offer user access to a fork of a library (ode) embedded in other bigger application (gazebo).

If to offer the users the option of accessing to our fork of ode is a must, then you are right.
content.html:
I was imaging that all that gazebo wants to expose to users is hosted in gazebo_physics_ode interface (library and headers) and if anybody needs to access to other ODE core features, he/she can use the main ode library and headers instead of the gazebo fork. It sounds a bit tricky to me to offer user access to a fork of a library (ode) embedded in other bigger application (gazebo).

If to offer the users the option of accessing to our fork of ode is a must, then you are right.
